title: Bug 103963 - No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data for a series, the application does not provide a friendly error message as expected.
EB: Expect the application to display a friendly error message when there is no data for a series to notify the user of the issue.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Create a chart.
2. Set the data definition.
3. Select a column without any data.
